name: Put on Your Pretty Face
description:
Put on Your Pretty Face

Discover your true self as you navigate the highs and lows of social media as you try to fit in. What could possibly go wrong?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Content Warnings:

  • Body Dysmorphia, Language and some depictions of blood

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: Keyboard and Mouse

Team Members:

  • Andrew Dresel-Kurtz (Programming and Art)
  • Ashley Perez (Programming)
  • Jane Tran (Programming and Art)
